attributes.name: water_level
attributes.description: The applied water level in dB.

attributes.name: input_units
attributes.description: Units of the input data in a common abbreviation, e.g. `m`, `m/s`, `nm/s^2`, ...

attributes.name: output_units
attributes.description: Units of the output data in a common abbreviation, e.g. `m`, `m/s`, `nm/s^2`, ...
